meanings.sent1: She could possibly finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: It is possibly going to rain later today.
meanings.sent3: He was possibly the fastest runner in the race.
meanings.sent4: The idea of time travel is possibly more fiction than science.
meanings.sent5: The chances of winning the lottery are possibly one in a million.

meanings.sent1: I will possibly go to the party if I finish my work on time.
meanings.sent2: There is possibly a sale at the store this weekend.
meanings.sent3: She is possibly the most forgetful person I know.
meanings.sent4: The solution to the problem is possibly right in front of us.
meanings.sent5: The cat is possibly hiding under the bed.
